Warped Axe
4% drop chance from Omen and Ogre enemies. You can find an Omen at the heavily guarded courtyard in Stormveil Castle. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace. [Map Link] If the dog is interfering with your farming attempts, equip Beast-Repellent Torch.
Normal
Name: Warped Axe
Location: 4% drop chance from Omen and Ogre enemies. You can find an Omen at the heavily guarded courtyard in Stormveil Castle. The nearest checkpoint is the Liftside Chamber site of grace. [Map Link] If the dog is interfering with your farming attempts, equip Beast-Repellent Torch.
Upgrade: Normal

Stormhawk Axe
One found in Leyndell, Royal Capital: near Fortified Manor, First Floor, in a courtyard with Iron Maidens [Map Link]. One found in Castle Sol: From the main entrance, hug the western ramparts and head north; enter a room with several slimes and climb the ladder inside; follow the ramparts west to a wooden bridge to the roof of the central building; on the northeastern section, hop up a pile of cluttered objects draped in cloth to get onto the awning with the axe [Map Link]. Finally, you can get two more of these by attacking and killing Nepheli.
Somber
Name: Stormhawk Axe
Location: One found in Leyndell, Royal Capital: near Fortified Manor, First Floor, in a courtyard with Iron Maidens [Map Link]. One found in Castle Sol: From the main entrance, hug the western ramparts and head north; enter a room with several slimes and climb the ladder inside; follow the ramparts west to a wooden bridge to the roof of the central building; on the northeastern section, hop up a pile of cluttered objects draped in cloth to get onto the awning with the axe [Map Link]. Finally, you can get two more of these by attacking and killing Nepheli.
Upgrade: Somber

Traveler's Clothes
Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found along with the rest of the set deep underground in a side room with a giant scarlet flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots grace site and just before Malenia's boss fight.
Name: Traveler's Clothes
Location: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: Found along with the rest of the set deep underground in a side room with a giant scarlet flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots grace site and just before Malenia's boss fight.

Dropped by the Deathbird east of the Warmaster's Shack

Name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
Location: Dropped by the Deathbird east of the Warmaster's Shack
Effect(s): Raises defense when HP is low (Activates under 20% health, raises damage negation by: current damage negation / 2 + 50)

Sacred Scorpion Charm
Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater

Name: Sacred Scorpion Charm
Location: Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater
Effect(s): Raises holy attack, but lowers damage negation. (Holy damage is increased by 12% in PvE and 8% in PvP. Increases physical damage taken by 10% in PvE and 15% in PvP.)

Radagon Icon
Found in the second floor of the Debate Parlor, Can be reached by jumping a fence in the courtyard
Shortens spell casting time. (Gives 30 virtual dexterity towards exclusively spellcasting (both sorceries and incantations). Casting speed is capped at 70 dexterity.)
Name: Radagon Icon
Location: Found in the second floor of the Debate Parlor, Can be reached by jumping a fence in the courtyard
Effect(s): Shortens spell casting time. (Gives 30 virtual dexterity towards exclusively spellcasting (both sorceries and incantations). Casting speed is capped at 70 dexterity.)

Lightning Strike
Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.
Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in a crevasse separating the landmass containing the Minor Erdtree from the eastern side of the peninsula. The scarab is found in the Southern section of the crevasse, South of the entrance to Morne Tunnel, surrounded by Giant Bats and a constant beat of lightning strikes from above. There are stone platforms on either cliffsides you can use to descend safely.
Name: Lightning Strike
Effect: Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.
How to get: Weeping Peninsula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in a crevasse separating the landmass containing the Minor Erdtree from the eastern side of the peninsula. The scarab is found in the Southern section of the crevasse, South of the entrance to Morne Tunnel, surrounded by Giant Bats and a constant beat of lightning strikes from above. There are stone platforms on either cliffsides you can use to descend safely.

Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking
Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy boss arena. Kill Tanith as she sits eating Rykards Corpse, and her Knight will invade you. Defeat him, and he will drop the Aspect.
Name: Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
Effect: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking
How to get: Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy boss arena. Kill Tanith as she sits eating Rykards Corpse, and her Knight will invade you. Defeat him, and he will drop the Aspect.

Name: Black Blade
Effect: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light.
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Black Blade with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Blessing Of The Erdtree
Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies
Found at Queens Bedchamber in Leyndell Royal Capital
Name: Blessing Of The Erdtree
Effect: Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies
How to get: Found at Queens Bedchamber in Leyndell Royal Capital
Blessing's Boon
Grants blessing to self and nearby allies
Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for 4,000 Runes. Blessings boon is found by defeating the first ancestral spirit after lighting the pillars in underground.
Name: Blessing's Boon
Effect: Grants blessing to self and nearby allies
How to get: Can be purchased from Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows for 4,000 Runes. Blessings boon is found by defeating the first ancestral spirit after lighting the pillars in underground.
Elden Stars
Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.
In the Deeproot Depths, head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. From there look to the north-west to see a root going up to a cave and follow it. Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ants until the end and you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.
Name: Elden Stars
Effect: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.
How to get: In the Deeproot Depths, head west from the Great Waterfall Crest grace until you reach some roots. From there look to the north-west to see a root going up to a cave and follow it. Enter the cave and fight through the packs of Giant Ants until the end and you'll find Elden Stars on a body facing the cave exit.
Erdtree Heal
Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies
Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Capital of Ash
Name: Erdtree Heal
Effect: Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies
How to get: Can be found in Queen's Bedchamber in Leyndell, Capital of Ash
Golden Lightning Fortification
Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies
Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is located in the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift
Name: Golden Lightning Fortification
Effect: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies
How to get: Crumbling Farum Azula: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found by the cliffs south of the fountain plaza. This area is located in the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift
Golden Vow
Increases attack and defense for self and allies
Corpse-Stench Shack, in Mt Gelmir.
Name: Golden Vow
Effect: Increases attack and defense for self and allies
How to get: Corpse-Stench Shack, in Mt Gelmir.
Protection Of The Erdtree
Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies
Dropped by an incantation scarab found on a stone platform slightly east of Goldmask's first location, in Altus Plateau
Name: Protection Of The Erdtree
Effect: Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies
How to get: Dropped by an incantation scarab found on a stone platform slightly east of Goldmask's first location, in Altus Plateau
Wrath Of Gold
Produces golden shockwave that knocks back foes
Found at Woodfolk Ruins. Among the enemies, there is a staircase that goes down and leads to a chest that contains this Incantation.
Name: Wrath Of Gold
Effect: Produces golden shockwave that knocks back foes
How to get: Found at Woodfolk Ruins. Among the enemies, there is a staircase that goes down and leads to a chest that contains this Incantation.
Burn, O Flame!
Raises a series of flame pillars around caster

Name: Burn, O Flame!
Effect: Raises a series of flame pillars around caster
How to get: Trade Remembrance of the Fire Giant with Enia at Roundtable Hold.
Flame Of The Fell God
Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze
Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire upon defeat.
Name: Flame Of The Fell God
Effect: Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze
How to get: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire upon defeat.

Hurls several balls of fire at once

Effect: Hurls several balls of fire at once
How to get: Purchase from Brother Corhyn or Miriel, Pastor of Vows after giving them the Giant's Prayerbook for 10k runes

Hurls massive ball of raging fire

Effect: Hurls massive ball of raging fire

Effect: Momentarily sparks flame from hand
How to get: Starting equipment for the Prophet Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 600 runes

Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames
Acquire the Flightless Bird Painting from Leyndell, Royal Capital. Then go to Windmill Heights southeast overlook, south of Windmill Village

Effect: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames

Throws balls of raging fire.

Greatly increases fire damage negation

Name: Flame, Protect Me
Effect: Greatly increases fire damage negation
How to get: Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: Found on a corpse inside a sealed room near the beginning, in front of the Site of Grace. The room requires one Stonesword Key to unlock.

Sweeps area before caster with stream of fire

Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

Effect: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

Howl Of Shabriri
Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes
Found in a chest on the second level of the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.
Name: Howl Of Shabriri
Effect: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes
How to get: Found in a chest on the second level of the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.
Inescapable Frenzy
Latches onto foes to spread madness
After making your way past Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has Inescapable Frenzy on it.
Name: Inescapable Frenzy
Effect: Latches onto foes to spread madness
How to get: After making your way past Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and defeating Mohg, The Omen, attack the altar at the front of the boss room. It should lower revealing a new area. Continue through here until you are forced to parkour downwards using stone coffins as platforms. Near the bottom you will see a corpse that has Inescapable Frenzy on it.
The Flame Of Frenzy
Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
Callu Baptismal Church in the Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse by a pillar on the left side of the church.
Name: The Flame Of Frenzy
Effect: Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes
How to get: Callu Baptismal Church in the Weeping Peninsula. Found on a corpse by a pillar on the left side of the church.

Black Flame's Protection
Increases phyiscal damage negation
Recieved from Gideon Ofnir, after selecting the 'about the secret medalion' dialogue option. In order for this question to appear, you will first need Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). The dialogue option is unlocked upon reaching Miquella's Haligtree.
Name: Black Flame's Protection
Effect: Increases phyiscal damage negation
How to get: Recieved from Gideon Ofnir, after selecting the 'about the secret medalion' dialogue option. In order for this question to appear, you will first need Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left) and Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right). The dialogue option is unlocked upon reaching Miquella's Haligtree.

Triple Rings Of Light
Fire three rings of light before the caster
Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree: From the Prayer Room grace, head out onto the eastern walkway and drop down one level by using the roofs on the right. There is a sealed treasure room just under the Prayer Room that requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. The chest containing the spell is inside.
Name: Triple Rings Of Light
Effect: Fire three rings of light before the caster
How to get: Elphael, Brace of The Haligtree: From the Prayer Room grace, head out onto the eastern walkway and drop down one level by using the roofs on the right. There is a sealed treasure room just under the Prayer Room that requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. The chest containing the spell is inside.
Pest Threads
Launches countless sticky threads before caster
Sold by Gowry for 7,500 Runes after progressing Millicent's questline and giving her the Valkyrie prosthesis.
Name: Pest Threads
Effect: Launches countless sticky threads before caster
How to get: Sold by Gowry for 7,500 Runes after progressing Millicent's questline and giving her the Valkyrie prosthesis.
Poison Armament
Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison
Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming the northeast section Aeonia Swamp in eastern Caelid. Watch for the glowing footprints, figure out its pattern then get in front of it and attack as the prints approach you
Name: Poison Armament
Effect: Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison
How to get: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming the northeast section Aeonia Swamp in eastern Caelid. Watch for the glowing footprints, figure out its pattern then get in front of it and attack as the prints approach you

Effect: Releases poison mist before caster.

Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes.
