Shadow Bait
Creates shadow that lures the aggression of foes of human build
Can be found on a corpse at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, after going through the pipe room to a room with the corpse sitting at the center, next to a not very well hidden Ogre ready to strike.
Name: Shadow Bait
Effect: Creates shadow that lures the aggression of foes of human build
How to get: Can be found on a corpse at Subterranean Shunning-Grounds, after going through the pipe room to a room with the corpse sitting at the center, next to a not very well hidden Ogre ready to strike.
Urgent Heal
Heals a small amount of HP.
Starting equipment for the Confessor Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000
Name: Urgent Heal
Effect: Heals a small amount of HP.
How to get: Starting equipment for the Confessor Class. Sold by Brother Corhyn at the Roundtable Hold for 1,000
Crystal Barrage - Sold by Sorceress Sellen (under the Waypoint Ruins, East of the lake).
Glintstone Arc - Sold by Sorceress Sellen
Glintstone Pebble - Sold by Sorceress Sellen
Glintstone Stars - Sold by Sorceress Sellen
Scholar's Armament - Sold by Sorceress Sellen
Scholar's Shield - Sold by Sorceress Sellen
Carian Slicer - Unlocked by Royal House Scroll (located on the ruin next to a mage, East of the Agheel Lake South Grace in South-East Limgrave)
Glintblade Phalanx - Unlocked by Royal House Scroll
Ambush Shard - Found under the Witchbane Ruins in North-West Weeping Peninsula
Crystal Burst - Kill the Demi-Human Queen in the Demi-Human Forest Ruins in the forest in the Center of Weeping Peninsula.
Rancorcall - From the Liftside Chamber Grace, go outside and turn right. At the end of the path is a ledge. Hop down it, even if it's scary, then work your way down to the bottom. At the bottom, past some rats, is a scarab with the spell.
Starlight - Sold by Thops in the Church of Irith near the Lake-Facing Cliffs Grace
Great Glintstone Shard - Unlocked by Academy Scroll (found at the grave West of the Lake-Facing Cliffs Grace in South Liurnia Lake).
Swift Glintstone Shard - Unlocked by Academy Scroll
Carian Greatsword - Sold by Miriel, Pastor of Vows at the Church of Vows in East Liurnia Lake.
Magic Glintblade - Sold by Miriel, Pastor of Vows
Ancient Death Rancor - Kill the Death Rite Bird next to the Gate Town North Grace, East of Raya Lucaria Academy, at Night.
Briars of Sin - North-West of the Artist's Shack, East of Academy Gate Town, there is a camp of fire guys. Outside the camp is lone enemy surrounded by fire slugs. Kill the lone enemy for the spell.
Greatblade Phalanx - Kill the boss of Cuckoo's Evergaol in West Liurnia Lake.
Magic Downpour - Kill Preceptor Miriam in Carian Study Hall without using the Carian Inverted Statue on the altar.
Meteorite - Kill Boss of the Royal Grave Evergaol in North Liurnia Lake
Shatter Earth - In Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel near the end.
Crystal Release - Kill the boss of Academy Crystal Cave
Terra Magica - Take the lift behind the boss room of Academy Crystal Cave and open the chest
Carian Piercer - Dropped by a scarab in Caria Manor. The beetle is found near the entrance to the manor on the East side.
Loretta's Greatbow - Kill the boss of Caria Manor
Frozen Armament - Dropped by the scarab north of Caria Manor. Can only be accessed after finished Caria Manor.
Carian Phalanx - Sold by Seluvis (you must give someone the potion or dispose of it with Gideon before he opens his shop
Carian Retaliation - Sold by Seluvis
Freezing Mist - Sold by Seluvis
Glintstone Icecrag - Sold by Seluvis
Cannon of Haima - Chest at the top of the Converted Fringe Tower in North-East Liurnia Lake. To get to the tower, you have to go past the Frenzied Flame Village North-East of the Bellum Church, North of the East Raya Lucaria Gate. Once at the Tower, you have to solve a puzzle. For this you must get any Glintstone Crown and use the Erudition emote. Once you have both items, wear the crown and use the emote while standing on the message in the Converted Fringe Tower.
The emote is gotten from Thops by giving him the secondary Glintstone Key found in on the chandelier at the top of the Church of Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria. Requires taking the rooftops outside the Debate Parlor and to the right.
A Glintstone Crown can be found near the key. While on balcony just before the key, find the crab and kill it.
Gavel of Haima - In the same chest as Cannon of Haima
Thops's Barrier - After giving Thops the second Glintstone Key, you can find it on his body outside the room of the Schoolhouse Classroom Grace in Raya Lucaria.
Shard Spiral - Purchased from Sellen after her quest if you sided with her.
Adula's Moonblade - Kill Glintstone Dragon Adula in the area accessed after Ranni's Questline.
Lucidity - Kill Preceptor Miriam in Carian Study Hall after using the Carian Inverted Statue gotten from Ranni's Questline on the altar.
Ranni's Dark Moon - After finishing Ranni's Questline, go to the area where the questline ends at South Liurnia Lake. In the South-West corner of this area is Chelona's Rise. Solve the puzzle by killing the 3 giant turtles found on the side of the cliff nearby, below the cliffs in the East, and in the air above the Spiritjump to the North. At the top of the tower is the spell.
Gravity Well - Just past the rotating elevator in Raya Lucaria, next to the Schoolhouse Grace. So the quick/tricky method is from the Grace, time jumping down to the rising elevator then hop down to the path below. If you can't do this, then come from the Church of the Cuckoo Grace and run past all the enemies. Past the elevator is a bunch of graves where an enemy will spawn. Kill it for the spell.
Glintstone Cometshard - Unlocked by Conspectus Scroll. Go to the room past the Schoolhouse Classroom Grace and turn left to find a room with the scroll inside.
Star Shower - Unlocked by Conspectus Scroll
Comet - In Raya Lucaria. From the Debate Parlor Grace, go back to the area before the boss room. Roll into the bookshelf with no books to find an Illusory Wall where the spell can be found.
Shattering Crystal - From the Debate Parlor Grace in Raya Lucaria, go outside and turn right. Hop down then climb the ladder to get to the roof. Make your way to the Church of the Cuckoo on the North-West side and it will there.
Rennala's Full Moon - Gotten from Rennala's Remembrance which is obtained by killing the boss of Raya Lucaria.
Oracle Bubbles - Go into the underground area via the lift at Siofra River Well in Limgrave's forest. From the Grace there, go through the ruins nearby and then turn around at the end and hop on top of them. Work your way over to the other side to where the scarab is. Kill the beetle for the spell
Great Oracular Bubble - Go into the underground area via the lift at Siofra River Well in Limgrave's forest. Go through the area to the next lift then take it to the next area. In the North-East section of this area is the Worshipper's Woods Grace. Go South from the Grace and use Matrix skills to dodge Radahn's Archery Instructors. Find a fallen pillar and hop on top of it then climb to the top to find a Waygate. Enter the nearby room full of enemies for a scarab. Beat it to death for putting you through all that for the spell.
Rock Sling - Under the North section of Street of Sages Ruins in the West part of the swamp.
Rock Blaster - In a chest in the upper level of Sellia Crystal Tunnel located North of the swamp. Easily gotten to from the teleport chest under the ruins in the South part of the lake in Limgrave.
Night Comet - One of the chests in Sellia that are available after unlocking the seals by lighting the towers.
Crystal Torrent - Kill the Boss of Sellia Hideaway. To find the hideaway, go to Sellia in the North-East part of the swamp. Go past the seals by lighting the fires at the tops of the towers. Go up the path to the Church of Plague. Go North of the Church to find the mage enemy and a giant gravestone. Roll into the cliff behind the Grave to break the Illusion and find the Hideaway.
Eternal Darkness - Go South from the Church of the Plague(explained just above) and cross the top of the gate nearby then go into the Swamp Lookout Tower to find the spell.
Night Maiden's Mist - Sold by Gowry in Gowry's Shack south of Sellia after finishing his request.
Night Shard - Sold by Gowry
Collapsing Stars - In a chest in the War-Dead Catacombs. The catacombs can be accessed after killing Radahn and are located in the North-East corner of his boss arena. The chest is on the lower levels, below all the fighting enemies.
Stars of Ruin - Requires you to have found the Comet Azur. After finding the Comet Azur, go to Sellen in the basement of Waypoint Ruins, East of where the game started. Talk to her about the Comet Azur and she will give you a key. After get the key, head to Sellian Hideaway in North Caelid past the seals in Sellia and North of the Church of the Plague Grace. It is hidden behind an Illusory wall behind a giant gravestone. Go through Sellia Hideaway and at the bottom you will find a seal guarded by a sorceror. Kill him and open the seal then talk to Master Lusat for the Sorcery.
Magma Shot - Reward from Volcano Manor's first request.
Tibia's Summons - After killing the boss of the "Coward's Path" aka Ruin-Strewn Precipice, take the path going North and get to the Wyndham Ruins. Kill the Tibia Mariner for the spell.
Roiling Magma - In the Hermit's Shack South of Volcano Manor. Requires going around the North side of the zone to reach South of the Manor.
Comet Azur - Found on the Primeval Sorcery Azur located just North of Hermit Village, South-East of Volcano Manor. He will be lying on the ground and has a crystal head. Talk to him for the Sorcery. Note: This Sorcery is needed for Sorceress Sellen's Questline.
Gelmir's Fury - Reward for helping Recusant Bernahl with his task in Volcano Manor. Requires being part of Volcano Manor, finishing at least one Volcano Manor request, and you cannot of killed Rykard or gotten to Crumbling Farum Azula yet.
Rykard's Rancor - Gotten from Rykard's Remembrance obtained after killing the Boss of Volcano Manor.
Unseen Blade - At the tower Mirage Rise located in North Altus Plateau, at the end of the path going West from the Minor Erdtree. To solve the puzzle, touch the three seals. One is South-West, One is East, and one is further East hidden by an Illusory Rock. The chest is at the top of the tower that appears.
Unseen Form - In the same chest as Unseen Blade
Fia's Mist - Defeat the Boss located past the Across the Roots Grace. You can reach the Grace by going up the roots leading over the buildings.
Zamor Ice Storms - South part of Zamor Ruins.
Briars of Punishment - On the path North from the Zamor Ruins. Next to the fire guys.
Founding Rain of Stars - Freezing Lake Grace in the North-East. Go up the slope to the North and find the broken bridge on the Southern side of the cliff. The bridge is actually just invisible. Cross the bridge and near the end, on the left, you will see a small layer of mist, use the mist to go up and then into Heretical Rise. Inside you will find the spell.
Explosive Ghostflame - Kill the Death Rite Bird, South-East of the Apostate Derelict in the North-West section of the Consecrated Snowfield, at Night. Requires the Haligtree Medallion.
Meteorite of Astel - Kill the Boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel in West Consecrated Snowfield. Requires Haligtree Medallion.
Loretta's Mastery - Kill the first Boss of the Haligtree. Requires Haligtree Medallion.
Stamp (Upward Cut)
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Stamp (Upward Cut)
Description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Stamp (Sweep)
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
Dropped by an invisible scarab on the beach east of Stormfoot Catacombs, in west Limgrave.
Name: Stamp (Sweep)
Description: Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks. Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab on the beach east of Stormfoot Catacombs, in west Limgrave.
Wild Strikes
Swing armaments with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.
Dropped by a scarab on the path north of the Castleward Tunnel site of grace, in northwest Limgrave.
Name: Wild Strikes
Description: Swing armaments with wild abandon. Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the path north of the Castleward Tunnel site of grace, in northwest Limgrave.
Lion's Claw
Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.
Dropped by the Lion Guardian in Fort Gael, in east Caelid.
Name: Lion's Claw
Description: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.
Location: Dropped by the Lion Guardian in Fort Gael, in east Caelid.
Cragblade
Reinforce weapon with earth.
Dropped by a scarab west of the Impassable Greatbridge site of grace, in south Caelid.
Name: Cragblade
Description: Reinforce weapon with earth.
Location: Dropped by a scarab west of the Impassable Greatbridge site of grace, in south Caelid.
Kick
Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Kick
Description: Push an enemy back with a high kick. Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance. Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Endure
Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Endure
Description: Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise. Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Ground Slam
Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.
Dropped by a scarab on a small hill, southwest of the Minor Erdtree in the Mistwood, in east Limgrave.
Name: Ground Slam
Description: Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on a small hill, southwest of the Minor Erdtree in the Mistwood, in east Limgrave.
Earthshaker
Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
Dropped by a stationary invisible scarab, at the road junction southwest of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace in south Altus Plateau.
Name: Earthshaker
Description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.
Location: Dropped by a stationary invisible scarab, at the road junction southwest of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace in south Altus Plateau.
Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.
Exchanged for the Remembrance of Hoarah Loux at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
Description: Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave. Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.
Location: Exchanged for the Remembrance of Hoarah Loux at the Roundtable Hold.
War Cry
Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: War Cry
Description: Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power. While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Barbaric Roar
Increase attack power. Strong attacks turn into savage combo attacks.
Dropped by a scarab in the Ravine-Veiled Village in north Liurnia.
Name: Barbaric Roar
Description: Increase attack power. Strong attacks turn into savage combo attacks.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in the Ravine-Veiled Village in north Liurnia.
Braggart's Roar
Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed.
Dropped by Blackguard Big Boggart, removable from his weapon Iron Ball.
Name: Braggart's Roar
Description: Declare your presence with a boastful roar. Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed.
Location: Dropped by Blackguard Big Boggart, removable from his weapon Iron Ball.
Troll's Roar
Generate powerful shock wave then slam weapon down
Found on top of the large rock south of the Church of Repose site of grace, in south Mountaintops of the Giants.
Name: Troll's Roar
Description: Generate powerful shock wave then slam weapon down
Location: Found on top of the large rock south of the Church of Repose site of grace, in south Mountaintops of the Giants.
Spinning Slash
Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Spinning Slash
Description: Skill favored by dexterous warriors. Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Impaling Thrust
Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Impaling Thrust
Description: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Piercing Fang
Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked
Dropped by Yura on death or during his quest, removable from his weapon Nagakiba.
Name: Piercing Fang
Description: Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter. Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked
Location: Dropped by Yura on death or during his quest, removable from his weapon Nagakiba.
Repeating Thrust
Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts. This Skill takes some time to build up, but it is very powerful.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road southeast of Agheel Lake North, in Limgrave.
Name: Repeating Thrust
Description: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts. This Skill takes some time to build up, but it is very powerful.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road southeast of Agheel Lake North, in Limgrave.
Double Slash
Skill of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
Dropped by a scarab on the rooftops of east Sellia, just southwest of the Sellia Under-stair site of grace, in Caelid.
Name: Double Slash
Description: Skill of superior swordsmen. Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the rooftops of east Sellia, just southwest of the Sellia Under-stair site of grace, in Caelid.
Sword Dance
Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Sword Dance
Description: Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes. Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Unsheathe
Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.
Dopped by a scarab on the edge of Agheel Lake by giant crabs, northwest of Agheel Lake South site of grace, in Limgrave.
Name: Unsheathe
Description: Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance. Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.
Location: Dopped by a scarab on the edge of Agheel Lake by giant crabs, northwest of Agheel Lake South site of grace, in Limgrave.
Quickstep
Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot. Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Quickstep
Description: Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot. Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Bloodhound's Step
Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the bridge north of Lenne's Rise, in Caelid.
Name: Bloodhound's Step
Description: Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep. This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the bridge north of Lenne's Rise, in Caelid.
Raptor of the Mist
Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.
Gained during Yura's quest, when defeating his target at the Main Academy Gate site of grace in Liurnia.
Name: Raptor of the Mist
Description: Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing. If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.
Location: Gained during Yura's quest, when defeating his target at the Main Academy Gate site of grace in Liurnia.
Beast's Roar
Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.
Reward from Gurranq after 4 deathroots, at Bestial Sanctum in Caelid.
Name: Beast's Roar
Description: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.
Location: Reward from Gurranq after 4 deathroots, at Bestial Sanctum in Caelid.
Square Off
This skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.
Dropped by a scarab on the west cliff, north of Worshippers' Woods site of Grace in Siofra River.
Name: Square Off
Description: This skill starts with the sword held level. Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the west cliff, north of Worshippers' Woods site of Grace in Siofra River.
Charge Forth
Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance.
Dropped by a scarab attached to the underside of the bridge north of the Fallen Ruins of the Lakes site of grace, in the middle of Liurnia. You will need to manually aim.
Name: Charge Forth
Description: Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust. Hold to cover a greater distance.
Location: Dropped by a scarab attached to the underside of the bridge north of the Fallen Ruins of the Lakes site of grace, in the middle of Liurnia. You will need to manually aim.
Spinning Strikes
Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.
Dropped by Edgar at the Revenger's Shack, removable from his weapon Banished Knight's Halberd +8.
Name: Spinning Strikes
Description: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.
Location: Dropped by Edgar at the Revenger's Shack, removable from his weapon Banished Knight's Halberd +8.
Giant Hunt
Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road south of Bellum Church site of grace, in North Liurnia.
Name: Giant Hunt
Description: Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes. Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road south of Bellum Church site of grace, in North Liurnia.
Storm Blade
Your armament is wrapped in a stormy blade that can be fired in rapid succession.
Dropped by the Grave Warden in Murkwater Catacombs in Limgrave, also sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Storm Blade
Description: Your armament is wrapped in a stormy blade that can be fired in rapid succession.
Location: Dropped by the Grave Warden in Murkwater Catacombs in Limgrave, also sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Storm Assault
One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.
Dropped by a scarab underneath Stormveil Castle, just before dropping down to the Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss fight.
Name: Storm Assault
Description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.
Location: Dropped by a scarab underneath Stormveil Castle, just before dropping down to the Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss fight.
Stormcaller
One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
Dropped by a scarab on the path opposite the Secluded Cell site of grace in Stormveil Castle, Limgrave.
Name: Stormcaller
Description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the path opposite the Secluded Cell site of grace in Stormveil Castle, Limgrave.
Storm Stomp
One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.
Found in a chest in the small underground room of the Gatefront Ruins, southeast of the Gatefront Ruins site of grace.
Name: Storm Stomp
Description: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.
Location: Found in a chest in the small underground room of the Gatefront Ruins, southeast of the Gatefront Ruins site of grace.
Vacuum Slice
Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
Found inside the ruined temple on the ground beneath the waterfalls by the Across the Roots site of grace, in Deeproot Depths.
Name: Vacuum Slice
Description: Lost skill of ancient heroes. Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.
Location: Found inside the ruined temple on the ground beneath the waterfalls by the Across the Roots site of grace, in Deeproot Depths.
Phantom Slash
Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the path northeast of Forbidden Lands site of grace, in Mountaintops of the Giants.
Name: Phantom Slash
Description: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the path northeast of Forbidden Lands site of grace, in Mountaintops of the Giants.
Determination
Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.
Dropped by a scarab on the road southeast of the Agheel Lake North site of grace, in Limgrave.
Name: Determination
Description: Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the road southeast of the Agheel Lake North site of grace, in Limgrave.
Royal Knight's Resolve
Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.
Found at the bottom of the cage room behind the imp statue in Volcano Manor. After making your way through the Manor to the portal to the boss of Volcano Manor, you should find the imp statue nearby.
Name: Royal Knight's Resolve
Description: Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord. Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.
Location: Found at the bottom of the cage room behind the imp statue in Volcano Manor. After making your way through the Manor to the portal to the boss of Volcano Manor, you should find the imp statue nearby.
Glintstone Pebble
Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.
Sold by Rogier in Stormveil Castle or in the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Glintstone Pebble
Description: Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.
Location: Sold by Rogier in Stormveil Castle or in the Roundtable Hold.
Glintblade Phalanx
Skill that creats glitnstone blades over your head and attack enemies automatically when they get close enough
Given to you by Rogier after defeating Godrick, speak to him in the Roundtable Hold. Removable from his weapon Rogier's Rapier.
Name: Glintblade Phalanx
Description: Skill that creats glitnstone blades over your head and attack enemies automatically when they get close enough
Location: Given to you by Rogier after defeating Godrick, speak to him in the Roundtable Hold. Removable from his weapon Rogier's Rapier.
Carian Greatsword
Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.
Sold by Rogier in Stormveil Castle or in the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Carian Greatsword
Description: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power.
Location: Sold by Rogier in Stormveil Castle or in the Roundtable Hold.
Carian Grandeur
Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.
Found on a corpse on top of an arch in Caria Manor, in Liurnia. Accessed by going up the stairs past the giant and turning left, through the door drop down until the second clifftop with a big jar. The stone arch and body should be visible from here.
Name: Carian Grandeur
Description: Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down. Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.
Location: Found on a corpse on top of an arch in Caria Manor, in Liurnia. Accessed by going up the stairs past the giant and turning left, through the door drop down until the second clifftop with a big jar. The stone arch and body should be visible from here.
Spinning Weapon
Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.
Sold by Rogier in Stormveil Castle or in the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Spinning Weapon
Description: Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses. Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.
Location: Sold by Rogier in Stormveil Castle or in the Roundtable Hold.
Loretta's Slash
Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.
Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta in Caria Manor, Liurnia.
Name: Loretta's Slash
Description: Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight. Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.
Location: Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta in Caria Manor, Liurnia.
Waves of Darkness
Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness.
Exchanged for the Remembrance of the Naturalborn at the Roundtable Hold.
Name: Waves of Darkness
Description: Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness.
Location: Exchanged for the Remembrance of the Naturalborn at the Roundtable Hold.
Gravitas
Pierce the ground with your armament to damage foes as a surge of gravity draws them in
Dropped by a Slender Wayfarer on the beach west of the Seaside Ruins site of grace, in south Limgrave. Be careful dropping down the cliffs.
Name: Gravitas
Description: Pierce the ground with your armament to damage foes as a surge of gravity draws them in
Location: Dropped by a Slender Wayfarer on the beach west of the Seaside Ruins site of grace, in south Limgrave. Be careful dropping down the cliffs.
Flaming Strike
Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.
Dropped by a scarab outside the south wall of Redmane Castle in Caelid.
Name: Flaming Strike
Description: Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc. Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike. This will also coat the armament in fire.
Location: Dropped by a scarab outside the south wall of Redmane Castle in Caelid.
Flame of the Redmanes
Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.
Dropped by an invisible scarab near Fort Gael North site of grace, in west Caelid.
Name: Flame of the Redmanes
Description: Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn. Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab near Fort Gael North site of grace, in west Caelid.
Eruption
Slamming the armament into the ground will spawn roiling lava which also spouts up upon release.
Sold by Bernahl in Volcano Manor.
Name: Eruption
Description: Slamming the armament into the ground will spawn roiling lava which also spouts up upon release.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in Volcano Manor.
Prelate's Charge
Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge.
Dropped by a scarab hanging on a tree in the camp, south of Whiteridge Road site of grace, in Mountaintops of the Giants.
Name: Prelate's Charge
Description: Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in. Hold to continue the charge.
Location: Dropped by a scarab hanging on a tree in the camp, south of Whiteridge Road site of grace, in Mountaintops of the Giants.
Black Flame Tornado
Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.
Dropped by the Godskin Duo in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Name: Black Flame Tornado
Description: Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames. Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.
Location: Dropped by the Godskin Duo in Crumbling Farum Azula.
Thunderbolt
Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.
Dropped by a scarab somewhere in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Starting at the Avenue Balcony site of grace, go down the stairs and through the door in front of them. Immediately turn left and hug the railing until you see the scarab on the other side of the railing below you.
Name: Thunderbolt
Description: Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning. Can be fired in rapid succession.
Location: Dropped by a scarab somewhere in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Starting at the Avenue Balcony site of grace, go down the stairs and through the door in front of them. Immediately turn left and hug the railing until you see the scarab on the other side of the railing below you.
Lightning Slash
Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.
Dropped by a scarab in the small camp outside the walls, northwest of the Hermit Merchant's Shack site of grace, in Altus Plateau
Name: Lightning Slash
Description: Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock. The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in the small camp outside the walls, northwest of the Hermit Merchant's Shack site of grace, in Altus Plateau
Lightning Ram
Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.
Dropped by a scarab east of the Stormcaller Church and southeast of the Sainted Hero's Grave, in Altus Plateau.
Name: Lightning Ram
Description: Skill inspired by tumbling rams. Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning. Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.
Location: Dropped by a scarab east of the Stormcaller Church and southeast of the Sainted Hero's Grave, in Altus Plateau.
Sacred Blade
Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for awhile.
Dropped by a scarab north of the Third Church of Marika site of grace in Limgrave. Found near the Spiritspring jump.
Name: Sacred Blade
Description: Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for awhile.
Location: Dropped by a scarab north of the Third Church of Marika site of grace in Limgrave. Found near the Spiritspring jump.
Prayerful Strike
Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.
Dropped by an invisible scarab in the western moat section of the Capital Outskirts. There is an arch full of slugs in the middle of the two pools, the scarab will run back and forth through here.
Name: Prayerful Strike
Description: Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground. This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab in the western moat section of the Capital Outskirts. There is an arch full of slugs in the middle of the two pools, the scarab will run back and forth through here.
Sacred Ring of Light
The armament gathers a sacred ring of light and then fires it forward, the skill can be fired in rapid succession.
Dropped by a scarab on the eastern edge of the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid. East of the Heart of Aeonia site of grace.
Name: Sacred Ring of Light
Description: The armament gathers a sacred ring of light and then fires it forward, the skill can be fired in rapid succession.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the eastern edge of the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid. East of the Heart of Aeonia site of grace.
Sacred Order
Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence.
Dropped by a scarab northwest of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in south Altus Plateau. On the path west of the water.
Name: Sacred Order
Description: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence.
Location: Dropped by a scarab northwest of the Abandoned Coffin site of grace in south Altus Plateau. On the path west of the water.
Shared Order
Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road southwest of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace, in Altus Plateau.
Name: Shared Order
Description: Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights. Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road southwest of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace, in Altus Plateau.
Golden Land
Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike
Dropped by a scarab south of the Great Waterfall Crest site of grace in Deeproot Depths. Behind the Erdtree Avatar.
Name: Golden Land
Description: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike
Location: Dropped by a scarab south of the Great Waterfall Crest site of grace in Deeproot Depths. Behind the Erdtree Avatar.
Golden Slam
Jump and slam on ground
Dropped by a scarab northeast of the Minor Erdtree, in the northwest section of the Woodfolk Ruins in Altus Plateau.
Name: Golden Slam
Description: Jump and slam on ground
Location: Dropped by a scarab northeast of the Minor Erdtree, in the northwest section of the Woodfolk Ruins in Altus Plateau.
Golden Vow
Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.
Dropped by a mounted Godrick Knight on the cliff above the Deathtouched Catacombs in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Golden Vow
Description: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.
Location: Dropped by a mounted Godrick Knight on the cliff above the Deathtouched Catacombs in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Vow of the Indomitable
Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree. Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.
Dropped by a scarab in the poisonous swamp area in the south of Liurnia lake. South of the Folly on the Lake site of grace.
Name: Vow of the Indomitable
Description: Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree. Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in the poisonous swamp area in the south of Liurnia lake. South of the Folly on the Lake site of grace.
Holy Ground
Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it
Found when the chariots are destroyed in Auriza Hero's Grave in the Capital Outskirts.
Name: Holy Ground
Description: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it
Location: Found when the chariots are destroyed in Auriza Hero's Grave in the Capital Outskirts.
Poisonous Mist
Coats the selected armament in poison, slashing spreads the toxic mist forward. The armament retain its poison for a while.
Dropped by a scarab in south Swamp of Aeonia, southeast of the Aeonia Swamp Shore site of grace, in Caelid.
Name: Poisonous Mist
Description: Coats the selected armament in poison, slashing spreads the toxic mist forward. The armament retain its poison for a while.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in south Swamp of Aeonia, southeast of the Aeonia Swamp Shore site of grace, in Caelid.
Poison Moth Flight
Slash with a poison-infused blade. If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road between the Caelid Highway South and Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank sites of grace, in Caelid.
Name: Poison Moth Flight
Description: Slash with a poison-infused blade. If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road between the Caelid Highway South and Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank sites of grace, in Caelid.
Blood Blade
Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.
Dropped by a scarab flying above water, northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace in Altus Plateau.
Name: Blood Blade
Description: Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging. Can be fired in rapid succession.
Location: Dropped by a scarab flying above water, northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace in Altus Plateau.
Bloody Slash
Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.
Dropped by the knight at the top of Fort Haight.
Name: Bloody Slash
Description: Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood. From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.
Location: Dropped by the knight at the top of Fort Haight.
Blood Tax
Blood Oath skill granted by Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.
Dropped by a scarab in a small cave on the east side of Mohgwyn Palace.
Name: Blood Tax
Description: Blood Oath skill granted by Lord of Blood. Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in a small cave on the east side of Mohgwyn Palace.
Seppuku
Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.
Dropped by an invisible scarab east of the Freezing Lake site of grace in Mountaintops of the Giants.
Name: Seppuku
Description: Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab east of the Freezing Lake site of grace in Mountaintops of the Giants.
Ice Spear
Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry southeast of Gate Town Bridge site of grace, in east Liurnia.
Name: Ice Spear
Description: Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni. Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry southeast of Gate Town Bridge site of grace, in east Liurnia.
Chilling Mist
Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.
Dropped by a scarab in the ruins to the south of Renna's Rise.
Name: Chilling Mist
Description: Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards. The armament retains its frost for a while.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in the ruins to the south of Renna's Rise.
Hoarfrost Stomp
Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.
Dropped by an invisible scarab in the water southeast of Caria Manor.
Name: Hoarfrost Stomp
Description: Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground. The mist applies the frost status effect.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab in the water southeast of Caria Manor.
Spectral Lance
Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.
Dropped by a scarab in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site of grace, head forwards through the area until you reach the stone walls guarded by many dogs. From the door of the wall, head north down a slope between gravestones and a tree, at the bottom will be the scarab.
Name: Spectral Lance
Description: Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights. Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in Raya Lucaria Academy. From the Church of the Cuckoo site of grace, head forwards through the area until you reach the stone walls guarded by many dogs. From the door of the wall, head north down a slope between gravestones and a tree, at the bottom will be the scarab.
Lifesteal Fist
Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.
Dropped by a scarab on the road just west of the Astray from Caelid Highway North site of grace in Caelid.
Name: Lifesteal Fist
Description: Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the road just west of the Astray from Caelid Highway North site of grace in Caelid.
White Shadow's Lure
Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow. The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression.
Dropped by an invisible scarab near the river northeast of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace, in Consecrated Snowfield. The scarab is being chased by a group of wolves.
Name: White Shadow's Lure
Description: Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow. The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab near the river northeast of the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace, in Consecrated Snowfield. The scarab is being chased by a group of wolves.
Assassin's Gambit
A skill where it masks the player's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. The ablilty grants near-invisibility and silenced footsteps.
Sold by Bernahl at the Volcano Manor.
Name: Assassin's Gambit
Description: A skill where it masks the player's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound. The ablilty grants near-invisibility and silenced footsteps.
Location: Sold by Bernahl at the Volcano Manor.
Mighty Shot
Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.
Dropped by a scarab on the road near the junction, north of the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace in the Weeping Peninsular.
Name: Mighty Shot
Description: Archery skill performed from an oblique stance. Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.
Location: Dropped by a scarab on the road near the junction, north of the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace in the Weeping Peninsular.
Through and Through
Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.
Dropped by an invisible scarab northwest of the Road of Iniquity site of grace in Mt. Gelmir, also northwest of the Volcano Manor entrance.
Name: Through and Through
Description: Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance. Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.
Location: Dropped by an invisible scarab northwest of the Road of Iniquity site of grace in Mt. Gelmir, also northwest of the Volcano Manor entrance.
Barrage
Archery skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.
Dropped by a scarab just north of Seethewater River site of grace in east Mt. Gelmir.
Name: Barrage
Description: Archery skill using a bow held horizontally. Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.
Location: Dropped by a scarab just north of Seethewater River site of grace in east Mt. Gelmir.
Sky Shot
Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from abose when it comes down.
Dropped by a scarab along the cliffs northwest of the Isolated Merchant's Shack site of grace in west Dragonbarrow.
Name: Sky Shot
Description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from abose when it comes down.
Location: Dropped by a scarab along the cliffs northwest of the Isolated Merchant's Shack site of grace in west Dragonbarrow.
Enchanted Shot
A skill where a spiritual essence is gathered within the arrow, allowing it to fly faster than a regular shot arrow. It also changes its trajectory to follow the target.
Dropped by a scarab behind a rock near a brazier, across the grassland north of the Ancestral Woods site of grace in Nokron, Eternal City.
Name: Enchanted Shot
Description: A skill where a spiritual essence is gathered within the arrow, allowing it to fly faster than a regular shot arrow. It also changes its trajectory to follow the target.
Location: Dropped by a scarab behind a rock near a brazier, across the grassland north of the Ancestral Woods site of grace in Nokron, Eternal City.
Rain of Arrows
Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles
Reward for solving the 'Redmane' Painting found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery. After looking at the painting in your inventory, it can be found on the cliffs east of the Minor Erdtree in east Dragonbarrow.
Name: Rain of Arrows
Description: Archery skill performed from a low stance. Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles
Location: Reward for solving the 'Redmane' Painting found in Sellia, Town of Sorcery. After looking at the painting in your inventory, it can be found on the cliffs east of the Minor Erdtree in east Dragonbarrow.
Parry
Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: Parry
Description: Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance. This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Golden Parry
Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance.
Dropped by a disappearing scarab on the left side of the stairs south of the Outer Wall Battleground site of grace, in the Capital Outskirts, Altus Plateau. Be careful approaching this scarab as it will disappear immediately, recommended to drop on it from above or range it.
Name: Golden Parry
Description: Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance. Effective even at a slight distance.
Location: Dropped by a disappearing scarab on the left side of the stairs south of the Outer Wall Battleground site of grace, in the Capital Outskirts, Altus Plateau. Be careful approaching this scarab as it will disappear immediately, recommended to drop on it from above or range it.
Storm Wall
Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
Dropped by a scarab in the small area after dropping off the bridge that bypasses Stormveil Castle. Follow the path north from the Stormhill Shack site of grace, without turning left up to the castle.
Name: Storm Wall
Description: Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in the small area after dropping off the bridge that bypasses Stormveil Castle. Follow the path north from the Stormhill Shack site of grace, without turning left up to the castle.
Shield Bash
Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.
Dropped by a teleporting scarab just northeast of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace.
Name: Shield Bash
Description: Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.
Location: Dropped by a teleporting scarab just northeast of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace.
Shield Crash
Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.
Dropped by a disappearing scarab in the Lux Ruins, on the cliff above the Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace in east Altus Plateau.
Name: Shield Crash
Description: Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered. Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.
Location: Dropped by a disappearing scarab in the Lux Ruins, on the cliff above the Erdtree-Gazing Hill site of grace in east Altus Plateau.
Barricade Shield
Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.
Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road west of the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace in the Weeping Peninsular.
Name: Barricade Shield
Description: Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.
Location: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry on the road west of the Castle Morne Rampart site of grace in the Weeping Peninsular.
Thops's Barrier
Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
Dropped by a scarab in the Church of Irith, only spawns after Thops leaves for the academy.
Name: Thops's Barrier
Description: Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
Location: Dropped by a scarab in the Church of Irith, only spawns after Thops leaves for the academy.
Carian Retaliation
Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
Sold by Pidia in Caria Manor, in Liurnia. Pidia can be found by dropping down a set of cliffs on the southeast side of Three Sisters.
Name: Carian Retaliation
Description: Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades. Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.
Location: Sold by Pidia in Caria Manor, in Liurnia. Pidia can be found by dropping down a set of cliffs on the southeast side of Three Sisters.
No Skill
This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.
Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Name: No Skill
Description: This armament has no skill. If the armament in the other hand has a skill, that skill will be used instead.
Location: Sold by Bernahl in the Warmaster's Shack in Stormhill, Limgrave.
Lost Ashes of War
Ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle. Unable to apply any kind of affinity in their current state, but can be used by Smithing Master Hewg of the Roundtable Hold to recreate other ashes.
Name: Lost Ashes of War
Description: Ashes of war, devoid of any memories of battle. Unable to apply any kind of affinity in their current state, but can be used by Smithing Master Hewg of the Roundtable Hold to recreate other ashes.
Banished Knight Engvall Ashes
Dropped by the Grave Warden Duelist boss in Murkwater Catacombs.
Name: Banished Knight Engvall Ashes
Location: Dropped by the Grave Warden Duelist boss in Murkwater Catacombs.
Banished Knight Oleg Ashes
Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss in Fringefolk Hero's Grave.
Name: Banished Knight Oleg Ashes
Location: Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit boss in Fringefolk Hero's Grave.
Godrick Soldier Ashes
Found in a cemetery filled with Spirit Jellyfish at the west end of Stormhill.
Name: Godrick Soldier Ashes
Location: Found in a cemetery filled with Spirit Jellyfish at the west end of Stormhill.
Lone Wolf Ashes
Given by Renna at the Church of Elleh after aquiring Torrent from Melina.
Name: Lone Wolf Ashes
Location: Given by Renna at the Church of Elleh after aquiring Torrent from Melina.
Noble Sorcerer Ashes
Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss in the Stormfoot Catacombs.
Name: Noble Sorcerer Ashes
Location: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss in the Stormfoot Catacombs.
Skeletal Militiaman Ashes
Dropped by the Tibia Mariner field boss at Summonwater Village.
Name: Skeletal Militiaman Ashes
Location: Dropped by the Tibia Mariner field boss at Summonwater Village.
Spirit Jellyfish Ashes
Given by Roderika in Stormhill Shack after talking to her several times.
Name: Spirit Jellyfish Ashes
Location: Given by Roderika in Stormhill Shack after talking to her several times.
Stormhawk Deenh
Found in a chest above the main hall of the Chapel of Anticipation, after returning there via The Four Belfries.
Name: Stormhawk Deenh
Location: Found in a chest above the main hall of the Chapel of Anticipation, after returning there via The Four Belfries.
Wandering Noble Ashes
Found on a corpse resting against a coffin, up a ladder and guarded by some Jade Goblins in the Stormfoot Catacombs.
Name: Wandering Noble Ashes
Location: Found on a corpse resting against a coffin, up a ladder and guarded by some Jade Goblins in the Stormfoot Catacombs.
Demi-Human Ashes
Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss in the Impaler's Catacombs.
Name: Demi-Human Ashes
Location: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss in the Impaler's Catacombs.
Lhutel the Headless
Dropped by the Cemetery Shade boss in the Tombsward Catacombs.
Name: Lhutel the Headless
Location: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade boss in the Tombsward Catacombs.
Warhawk Ashes
Dropped by the spirit artist at the northern tip of Weeping Peninsula, north of the Church of Pilgrimage. Requires the Prophecy Painting found in Stormveil Castle.
Name: Warhawk Ashes
Location: Dropped by the spirit artist at the northern tip of Weeping Peninsula, north of the Church of Pilgrimage. Requires the Prophecy Painting found in Stormveil Castle.
Albinauric Ashes
Found on a corpse in the graveyard area east of Caria Manor.
Name: Albinauric Ashes
Location: Found on a corpse in the graveyard area east of Caria Manor.
Avionette Soldier Ashes
Found on a corpse in Raya Lucaria Academy, down the rotating lift on the ledge before reaching the bottom.
Name: Avionette Soldier Ashes
Location: Found on a corpse in Raya Lucaria Academy, down the rotating lift on the ledge before reaching the bottom.
Black Knife Tiche Ashes
Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader in the Ringleader's Evergaol.
Name: Black Knife Tiche Ashes
Location: Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader in the Ringleader's Evergaol.
Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet
First sold by Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise, then later can be found on the body of Pidia in Caria Manor.
Name: Dolores the Sleeping Arrow Puppet
Location: First sold by Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise, then later can be found on the body of Pidia in Caria Manor.
Dung Eater Puppet
Sold by Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise after using Seluvis's Potion on the Dung Eater.
Name: Dung Eater Puppet
Location: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise after using Seluvis's Potion on the Dung Eater.
Fanged Imp Ashes
Can be selected as a Keepsake; otherwise, sold by the Isolated Merchant east of the Main Academy Gate site of grace.
Name: Fanged Imp Ashes
Location: Can be selected as a Keepsake; otherwise, sold by the Isolated Merchant east of the Main Academy Gate site of grace.
Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
Sold by Preceptor Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after completing Ranni's questline.
Name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
Location: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after completing Ranni's questline.
Glintstone Sorcerer Ashes
Dropped by the Spirit-Caller Snail boss in the Road's End Catacombs.

Location: Dropped by the Spirit-Caller Snail boss in the Road's End Catacombs.

Sold by Preceptor Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after completing Ranni's questline.

Location: Sold by Preceptor Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after completing Ranni's questline.
Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss in the Impaler's Catacombs.
Name: Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
Location: Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog boss in the Impaler's Catacombs.
Land Squirt Ashes
Found at a grave surrounded by land squirts on the east shore of the lake, north of the Gate Town Bridge site of grace.
Name: Land Squirt Ashes
Location: Found at a grave surrounded by land squirts on the east shore of the lake, north of the Gate Town Bridge site of grace.
Latenna the Albinauric
Found at the Slumbering Wolf's Shack, out the end of Lakeside Crystal Cave. You must possess the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right) for her to join you.
Name: Latenna the Albinauric
Location: Found at the Slumbering Wolf's Shack, out the end of Lakeside Crystal Cave. You must possess the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right) for her to join you.
Marionette Soldier Ashes
Found on a corpse hanging off the edge of the lower path past the bridge in the graveyard in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Name: Marionette Soldier Ashes
Location: Found on a corpse hanging off the edge of the lower path past the bridge in the graveyard in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Nepheli Loux Puppet
First sold by Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise after using Seluvis's Potion on Nepheli Loux, then later can be found on the body of Pidia in Caria Manor.
Name: Nepheli Loux Puppet
Location: First sold by Preceptor Seluvis in Seluvis's Rise after using Seluvis's Potion on Nepheli Loux, then later can be found on the body of Pidia in Caria Manor.
Page Ashes

Ruptured Crystal Tear [2]
Reward for defeating the Putrid Avatar north of the Cave of Forlorn Grace
Deal 800 damage in a 2-meter radius, but take 300 yourself; if using both, deal 1,750 damage in a 4-meter radius, but take 700 yourself
Name: Ruptured Crystal Tear [2]
Location: Reward for defeating the Putrid Avatar north of the Cave of Forlorn Grace
Effect: Deal 800 damage in a 2-meter radius, but take 300 yourself; if using both, deal 1,750 damage in a 4-meter radius, but take 700 yourself
Found in Oridys' Rise, on the plateau to the east side of the Weeping Peninsula.
Purchasable from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold for 3,000 Runes.
Found in the Converted Tower, in the southwest of Liurnia of the Lakes.
Reward for defeating Red Wolf of Radagon in Raya Lucaria Academy.
Found in Testu's Rise, north of Raya Lucaria Academy.
Found Seluvis's Rise behind Caria Manor in Liurnia of the Lakes.
Found in Lenne's Rise in eastern Caelid.
Reward for defeating Demi-Human Queen Maggie, northeast of Hermit Village in Mt. Gelmir.
Reward for defeating Margit, the Fell Omen in Stormveil Castle.
Speak to Finger Reader Enia after acquiring two Great Runes. Will appear in Twin Maiden Husks' shop if you progress too far.
Reward for defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Golden Shade) in Leydell, Royal Capital.
Royal House Scroll - East of the Agheel Lake South Site of Grace, on a ruin, next to a mage enemy.
Academy Scroll - West of the Lake-Facing Cliffs Site of Grace, in a graveyard.
Conspectus Scroll - Near the Schoolhouse Classroom Site of Grace in Raya Lucaria; turn left as you leave the grace room headed into the building.
Assassin's Prayerbook - Behind an Imp Statue door that's behind another Imp Statue door in Roundtable Hold. Requires 3 Stonesword Keys total.
Godskin Prayerbook - Behind an Imp Statue door in Stormveil Castle. From the Liftside Chamber Site of Grace, exit into the courtyard and hug the right wall until you find a set of stairs going down on the wall on the other side.
Fire Monks' Prayerbook - In a Fire Monk camp in the southern edge of Liurnia, near the Fire Spur Me gesture.
Dragon Cult Prayerbook - Kill the Leyndell Knight patrolling south of the Artist's Shack Site of Grace in Liurnia.
Two Fingers' Prayerbook - Near the Fortified Manor, First Floor Site of Grace, in a room to the south, by a fireplace. Same room as the By My Sword gesture.
Golden Order Principia - In Leyndell, from the Erdtree Sanctuary Site of Grace, exit east and climb up to the second floor. Go through the door, jump down to the roof on the left, and go through the broken window. Climb a root to the chair hanging from the ceiling.
Giant's Prayerbook - In Mountaintops of the Giants, at the top of Guardian's Garrison, up a ladder behind Chief Guardian Arghanthy.
Ancient Dragon Prayerbook - Northwest of the Crumbling Beast Site of Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula, in the middle of the main hall.

Smithing Stone 1/2
Dropped by the boss of the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnels.
: [1]
Unlocks: Smithing Stone 1/2
Location: Dropped by the boss of the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnels.
[2]
Smithing Stone 3/4
In a chest in the Sealed Tunnel, North-East of the Minor Erdtree Church next to the South-West gate of Leyndell. The tunnel is in the river of the outer moat. Inside the Tunnel you will find lots of Illusory Walls. In a chest behind the Illusory Wall just before reaching the elevator is the Bell Bearing.
: [2]
Unlocks: Smithing Stone 3/4
Location: In a chest in the Sealed Tunnel, North-East of the Minor Erdtree Church next to the South-West gate of Leyndell. The tunnel is in the river of the outer moat. Inside the Tunnel you will find lots of Illusory Walls. In a chest behind the Illusory Wall just before reaching the elevator is the Bell Bearing.
[3]
Smithing Stone 5/6
Under the Zamor Ruins at the entrance of Mountaintops of the Giants. In the ruins, find a staircase going under the ruins and open the chest for the Bell Bearing.
: [3]

Location: Under the Zamor Ruins at the entrance of Mountaintops of the Giants. In the ruins, find a staircase going under the ruins and open the chest for the Bell Bearing.

[1]
Somber Stone 1/2
Dropped by the boss of Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Fastest way to the tunnel is by taking the teleporter chest located in the ruins at the South end of the lake in Limgrave. Under the ruins and past some rats is a chest that will teleport you to the Tunnel.
: [1]
Unlocks: Somber Stone 1/2
Location: Dropped by the boss of Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Fastest way to the tunnel is by taking the teleporter chest located in the ruins at the South end of the lake in Limgrave. Under the ruins and past some rats is a chest that will teleport you to the Tunnel.
[2]
Somber Stone 3/4
Dropped by the boss of Altus Tunnel.
: [2]

[3]
Somber Stone 5/6
Found on a body at the First Church of Marika in East Mountaintops of the Giants.

[4]
Somber Stone 7/8
Next to the Tempest-Facting Balcony Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula.
: [4]
Unlocks: Somber Stone 7/8
Location: Next to the Tempest-Facting Balcony Grace in Crumbling Farum Azula.
[5]
Somber Stone 9
In Crumbling Farum Azula. Little hard to explain. From the Dragon Temple Rooftop Grace, hop down to where all the nasty birds are. Past the birds is a dragon. Going past the dragon to the right is a bunch of demi-humans. Past them is a ruin that's fallen over and become a bridge. In the next building on the right is a corpse with the Bell Bearing.
: [5]
Unlocks: Somber Stone 9
Location: In Crumbling Farum Azula. Little hard to explain. From the Dragon Temple Rooftop Grace, hop down to where all the nasty birds are. Past the birds is a dragon. Going past the dragon to the right is a bunch of demi-humans. Past them is a ruin that's fallen over and become a bridge. In the next building on the right is a corpse with the Bell Bearing.
[1]
Grave Glovewort 1/2/3
Dropped by the boss of Wyndham Catacombs located on North of the Lux Ruins, North of the exit of the "Cowards" Path aka Ruins-Strewn Precipice.
: [1]
Unlocks: Grave Glovewort 1/2/3
Location: Dropped by the boss of Wyndham Catacombs located on North of the Lux Ruins, North of the exit of the "Cowards" Path aka Ruins-Strewn Precipice.
[2]
Grave Glovewort 4/5/6
Dropped by the boss of Giants' Mountaintop Catacomb located North of the Zamor Ruins. On the path North, when you meet the fire guys, turn to the right and down the stairs to the catacomb.
: [2]
Unlocks: Grave Glovewort 4/5/6
Location: Dropped by the boss of Giants' Mountaintop Catacomb located North of the Zamor Ruins. On the path North, when you meet the fire guys, turn to the right and down the stairs to the catacomb.
[3]
Grave Glovewort 7/8/9
In Crumbling Farum Azula in a lake. Go down the elevator South-West of the room that is North-West from the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths Grace. You'll see a lake down the path and the Bell Bearing is there.
: [3]
Unlocks: Grave Glovewort 7/8/9
Location: In Crumbling Farum Azula in a lake. Go down the elevator South-West of the room that is North-West from the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths Grace. You'll see a lake down the path and the Bell Bearing is there.

Ghost Glovewort 7/8/9
Requires Haligtree Medallion. In Miquella's Haligtree. From the Haligtree Roots Grace, go up the elevator and outside the church. Turn left and go down to all the shrimp men and it will next to a grave.

Stimulating Boluses
